Html: I am looking at the best way of implementing Windows dialogs while still keeping to a pure MVVM pattern. At the moment I am using the notification mechanism for standard dialogs. Do I need to create a custom open / save etc or is there a way of utilizing the built in ones?
That is exactly what the InteractionRequest features are for in Prism. Prism 5 added the code for WPF dialogs, so check out the Interactivity Quickstart in Prism 5.
